Entiy Pruner

Package com.saliman.entitypruner

Interface Summary
EntityPruner This interface defines methods to "prunes" entities so they can be serialized or Marshalled for use in Web Service and RMI calls.
Options This interface defines the standard keys that can appear in an options map.
PrunableEntity Classes implement this interface to mark it as being prunable by the EntityPruner.
PruningState This interface defines the valid pruning states for an entity.
 

Class Summary
EntityPrunerHibernateJpa This class provides an implementation of the EntityPruner for applications using JPA and Hibernate.
EntityUtil This class is a utility class for working with Entity instances and their descendants.
ReflectionUtil This class contains utilities for working with reflection.
